THIS_IS_STATION_YOU_DO_NOT_HAVE_ENOUGH.message: هذه هي {station}. أنت ليس لديك مال كافي لسعر الرسو من {fee}.

WELCOME_ABOARD_STATION_FEE_DEDUCTED.description: Station welcome message, docking in orbit
WELCOME_ABOARD_STATION_FEE_DEDUCTED.message: مرحبا بكم على متن {station}. سعر الرسو من {fee} قد تم خصمه.

WELCOME_TO_STATION_FEE_DEDUCTED.description: Station welcome message, ground station landing
WELCOME_TO_STATION_FEE_DEDUCTED.message: Welcome to {station}. Your landing fee of {fee} has been deducted.
